experience.description: Directing a team of 11 students in collaboration with the Practical AI Podcast (PAI) and Prediction Guard.
achievements: Spearheading the development of a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbot that enhances user engagement by providing accurate, context-aware responses linked to podcast episode transcripts and timestamps.

Leading the design and implementation of a full-stack podcast generation application, enabling users to create personalized podcast episodes using voice cloning technology trained on Practical AI Podcast hosts.
Providing technical guidance to team members, fostering a collaborative learning environment that emphasizes best practices in software development and project management.
Managing a team of 11 students through biweekly Agile sprints, ensuring timely delivery of project milestones and maintaining high code quality across a complex 50,000+ line codebase.

experience.description: Worked in the Replenishment Engineering team to build a scalable service that provides data scientists with development environments pre-loaded with custom tooling and essential libraries.
achievements: Pioneered a service that reduced expenses spent on dry-running optimization/machine learning models in the development process.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams including data scientists, DevOps engineers, and product managers to ensure seamless integration and deployment of the service.
Minimized associated expenses by optimizing resource allocation and use using AWS Lambda, Kinesis, and Elastic File System (EFS).

experience.description: Managed sales and advertising data across multiple e-commerce platforms for 11 clients within a unified KPI dashboard.
achievements: Integrated sales/advertising data from 5+ e-commerce platforms and 12+ databases into a unified KPI dashboard.
Connected disparate sources including Amazon, Google, Meta, Walmart, Shopify, and WooCommerce.
Enabled OMP experts to analyze data for 11 retail clients, with up to 60 performance metrics for 150 products.

experience.description: Collaborated Bayer Crop Sciences in 2023-2024 to model future climate change impacts on sweet corn yields, while in 2024-2025, partnered with Syngenta to integrate machine learning models with GxExM to predict product placement
achievements: Optimized a LightGBM model for large-scale genomic datasets through hyperparameter tuning and cross-validation, improving Pearson correlation and reducing RMSE.
Implemented data preprocessing pipelines for quality control, including filtering genetic markers and normalizing phenotypic outliers using mixed linear models.
